it.unibo.command.utility

Class CommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.command.utility.CommandFactory

  • public class CommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class for ICommand instance
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      it.unibo.iot.models.robotCommands.IRobotCommand getCommand(CommandType tipo)

      Used to obtain the opposite of a given command
      boolean isDefaultSpeedMode()
      Default speed mode means that all the command are at the same speed
      void setSpeed(it.unibo.iot.models.robotCommands.RobotSpeedValue newSpeedValue)
      Sets the default speed for the command produced by the factory
      void switchMode()
      Method used to change the execution mode of the factory from default speed to free speed.

      • getCommand

        public it.unibo.iot.models.robotCommands.IRobotCommand getCommand(java.lang.String tipo)
        Get command from it's String name, corresponding to the enum value of CommandType
        Parameters:
        tipo - type of command
        Returns:
        an instance of ICommand corresponding to the queried CommandType, with default speed
